languages.text: "Шерин, я тебя заждалась". {n}Джай возлежит в вашей купальне с таким видом, будто она скорее ее, чем ваша. Стоящая рядом бутылка мерцает алым в отблесках свечей.{/n} "Иди скорее сюда, вода горяча, как объятия молодых любовников в их первую ночь".

"Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."
languages.original_text: "Шерин, я тебя заждалась". {n}Джай возлежит в вашей купальне с таким видом, будто она скорее ее, чем ваша. Стоящая рядом бутылка мерцает алым в отблесках свечей.{/n} "Иди скорее сюда, вода горяча, как объятия молодых любовников в их первую ночь".

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the embrace of young lovers on their first night together."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the embrace of young lovers on their first night together."

The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the embrace of young lovers on their first night together."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，我一直在等你。”{n}婕伊躺在浴缸里，神情自若，甚至让你以为仿佛是你闯入了她的私人浴室。浴缸旁的瓶子在烛光的映照下，闪烁着红色的光芒。{/n}“快进来吧，水已经热了，就像渴切的灵魂之火一样热烈。”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，我一直在等你。”{n}婕伊躺在浴缸里，神情自若，甚至让你以为仿佛是你闯入了她的私人浴室。浴缸旁的瓶子在烛光的映照下，闪烁着红色的光芒。{/n}“快进来吧，水已经热了，就像年轻恋人初夜的拥抱一样热烈。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン、待ってたよ」{n}ジェイは、彼女のプライベートな浴室に邪魔しているのはあなただと思わせるほど、平然とバスタブに座っていた。浴槽の横に置かれたボトルが、キャンドルの光で赤く輝いている。 {/n}「急いで。お湯が熱いの。まるで恋焦がれる心の炎みたいに」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、待ってたよ」{n}ジェイは、彼女のプライベートな浴室に邪魔しているのはあなただと思わせるほど、平然とバスタブに座っていた。浴槽の横に置かれたボトルが、キャンドルの光で赤く輝いている。 {/n}「急いで。お湯が熱いの。まるで恋焦がれる心の炎みたいに」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Shereen, le estaba esperando». {n}Jae está tumbada en la bañera con un aire tan despreocupado que cabría pensar que eres tú quien visita su baño privado y no al revés. La botella junto a la bañera desprende un brillo rojizo a la luz de las velas.{/n} «Deprisa, el agua está tan caliente como el fuego de la añoranza en un corazón».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, le estaba esperando». {n}Jae está tumbada en la bañera con un aire tan despreocupado que cabría pensar que eres tú quien visita su baño privado y no al revés. La botella junto a la bañera desprende un brillo rojizo a la luz de las velas.{/n} «Deprisa, el agua está tan caliente como el abrazo de dos amantes en su primera noche».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, shereen... Je vous attendais. » {n}Jae est confortablement installée dans la baignoire, avec un air si nonchalant que vous en venez presque à vous demander si ce n'est pas vous qui faites irruption dans sa salle de bain personnelle. Le liquide rouge de la bouteille à ses côtés scintille à la lueur des bougies.{/n} « Ne traînez pas. L'eau est chaude, comme le feu qui brûle au sein d'un cœur qui se languit. »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, shereen... Je vous attendais. » {n}Jae est confortablement installée dans la baignoire, avec un air si nonchalant que vous en venez presque à vous demander si ce n'est pas vous qui faites irruption dans sa salle de bain personnelle. Le liquide rouge de la bouteille à ses côtés scintille à la lueur des bougies.{/n} « Ne traînez pas. L'eau est chaude, comme l'étreinte de deux jeunes amants lors de leur toute première nuit. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen, ich habe auf Euch gewartet." {n}Jae liegt mit absoluter Ungeniertheit in der Badewanne, sodass es so wirkt, als würdest du in ihr privates Badezimmer eindringen. Die Flasche neben der Badewanne leuchtet rot im Kerzenschein.{/n} "Beeilt Euch. Das Wasser ist heiß, wie das Feuer in einem sehnsüchtigen Herzen."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, ich habe auf Euch gewartet." {n}Jae liegt mit absoluter Ungeniertheit in der Badewanne, sodass es so wirkt, als würdest du in ihr privates Badezimmer eindringen. Die Flasche neben der Badewanne leuchtet rot im Kerzenschein.{/n} "Beeilt Euch. Das Wasser ist so heiß wie die Umarmungen junger Liebender in ihrer ersten gemeinsamen Nacht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

languages.text: "Şirinim, ben de seni bekliyordum." {n}Jae, küvette öylesine kayıtsızca uzanıyor ki biri görse onun özel banyosuna izinsiz girenin sen olduğunu düşünür. Banyonun kenarındaki şişe, mumların ışığı nedeniyle kıpkırmızı parıldıyor.{/n} "Çabuk ol. Su, özlem çeken yüreği kaplayan alevler gibi sıcacık."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've been waiting for you." {n}Jae is reclining in the bathtub with such an air of nonchalance that one would think you were the one intruding in her private bathroom. The bottle next to the bath gleams red in the glow of the candles.{/n} "Hurry up. The water is hot, like the fire in a longing heart."

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim, ben de seni bekliyordum." {n}Jae küvette öylesine kayıtsızca uzanıyor ki, biri görse, onun özel banyosuna izinsiz girenin sen olduğunu düşünür. Banyonun kenarındaki şişe, mumların ışığı nedeniyle kıpkırmızı parıldıyor.{/n} "Çabuk ol. Su sıcak. Tıpkı özlem çeken bir yüreği kaplayan alevler gibi."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
